Henderson, Texas.
June, 10,th 1880

Mrs. L. L. McLanis,
    Dear friend,

        My Ma requested
me to write and ask, if you knew the
address of Hon. Jefferson Davis, if you
do, please be so kind as to send it to her.

Your true friend,
Fronie Gathright.
